metadata.name: LVX
metadata.description:
LVX - Collaboration between Luca Devinu and Victor Scorrano, made in 24 hours on 22 • 02 • 2022.
Based on one of the "big questions" that the Universe enlightens us about:

On the theory of dimensional relativity, we know that a dragonfly perceives time differently from us humans. To they 20,000 eyes we are slow as a mountain. While we can observe they whole life and that of another 1,080 generations (if life is good with you).
So I was wondering, a creature larger than the universe itself, would watch "the everything" turning on and off like a firework?


How much is this moment worth?



"Music in the background by Polyphony +"
